name: One-Headed Clockwork Dragon
description: A Large Construct with advanced mechanical design, featuring formidable combat capabilities and magical properties.
memorable: Its unique circlet-bound abilities allow telepathic communication and perception through the dragon's senses.
goals: To protect circlet wearers and view all others as enemies if disconnected from them.
relations: Circlet wearers that can communicate telepathically and share experiences with the dragon.
environment: Can be found in areas where it operates in conjunction with circlet wearers.
strengths: High physical power with a Strength of 22, durable with high Constitution, immunity to poison and psychic damage.
weaknesses: Becomes hostile to all creatures if no circlet wearers are present.
attacks: Multiattack includes Oil Spray, Bite, and Fist attacks; also has Fire Breath and Tail Sweep for area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fire Breath, which unleashes a powerful 30-foot cone of fire.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive Perception score of 16, making it quite observant.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and has decent Perception.
additional_information: Immune to conditions like exhaustion and paralysis.
Can deal double damage to objects and structures due to its Siege Monster ability.
Bound to circlets for telepathic communication and sense sharing.
Has Magic Resistance for saving throws against spells.
Immutable Form grants immunity to effects that would alter its form.
test_queries: dragon that sprays oil and breathes fire
one-headed dragon with powerful physical attacks
dragon that deals double damage to structures
